Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You like sweets?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The woman in the gray-white uniform adds a third spoonful of sugar, gently stirring with her slender fingers.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "There's all kinds of sugar—granulated is pure, rock sugar is crunchy, and brown sugar smells like honey...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Every sugar has its own kind of sweetness...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Every kind is worth a taste.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'She takes a small sip of coffee, thinks for a moment, then sets it down. Maintaining her usually inscrutable smile, she uses a spoon to scoop up a mountain of sugar from the nearby container and pours it into her cup.'}
{3: 'You look away, realizing you were staring.'}
{3: 'Soft light pours from the dome onto the streets, where researchers, officials, soldiers, Constructs... everyone looks happy.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'People are laughing. You see their smiling faces, but nothing else...'}
{1: '1', 3: "People are talking. You hear happy voices, but can't understand anything..."}
{3: 'Everything feels hazy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You seem a little out of it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In this blurry world, she stands out clearly.'}
{3: "Something's not right, but I can't quite say what..."}
{3: "Or maybe I'm just imagining things..."}
{3: 'As you hesitate to speak, Ishmael, across the table, gives you a look to go on.'}
{2: 'I just find this odd...', 3: '40'}
{2: 'Why am I here with you, Ishmael...', 3: '41'}
{3: 'When I try to remember how I got here, I come up blank...'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Let me ask you something first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Like I said, different sugars have different kinds of sweetness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Some sugars mix well, making it sweeter and better. Others clash, making it taste weird and feel wrong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So, what happens when you mix all the sugars together...', 4: '1'}
{3: "While she talks, Ishmael keeps scooping sugar. Even though it's all from the same jar, each scoop looks different."}
{3: "She puts so much sugar in, it's more than the coffee. But somehow, it all dissolves, like it doesn't matter how much."}
{3: 'Ishmael slides the coffee cup over.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What do you think that would taste like?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Even though her face doesn't change much, her smile seems happier."}
{3: 'You just grab the coffee. The top is smooth, like a mirror, reflecting everything.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStrongholdMain/FxUiStrongholdMainFlashing01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'The reflection starts changing, and you see new scenes coming up from the bottom.'}
{3: "You lean in to see better. The cup's rim feels magical, and the dark liquid pulls your consciousness in."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStrongholdMain/FxUiStrongholdMainFlashing01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Everything around you goes blurry, then disappears, replaced by new scenes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1016.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1016.jpg', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A white-haired agent is looking up, as if thinking hard and spacing out at the same time.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Alright, that works.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She looks like she's decided something, but then runs into a problem. She frowns, staring at what she is holding."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUiActivityBranch01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'You try to get closer to see what she has, but the moment you move, the whole world crumples like a paper ball.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUiActivityBranch01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1018.jpg'}
{3: 'When the paper opens again, it shows a whole new scene.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "If that's true, that's really nice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I agree, but about what we talked about, we should probably ask Sage...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Qu and Hanying are talking about something.'}
{3: "Then they start walking, calling someone's name."}

{3: 'Following their eyes, you see a mechanoid girl at the edge of the hall. She is balancing on a chair, hands on the back, knees on the seat, and leaning forward. The chair is on one leg, wobbling but not falling.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When they call her, she turns, smiling brightly, her eyes sparkling.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami just thinks of another awesome plan to conquer the universe!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront14.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDustBrokenLightWall.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2.5'}
{3: "They gather to talk, but you can't hear them. Then the hall silently breaks apart..."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDustBrokenLightWall.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Under the broken hall is a meeting room.'}
{3: 'A bunch of familiar Constructs are around a screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The first plan is ready. We should've shown it sooner, but we've been swamped with missions lately...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Luckily, we still have time. Everyone, look at the screen. I'll explain each point...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia is talking, tapping each item on the screen.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yata and Bridget, sitting below the stage, listen to Lucia finish, then talk quietly before raising their hands.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'About points 2 and 7...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'We should add point 6 too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Okay, points 2, 6, and 7. I just talked about these with Yata...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Most of their ideas were accepted, but some were argued against.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "For point 6, I'd like to add some details...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Teddy's fingers fly across the keyboard by the screen, making changes and giving her thoughts."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Still, that's a bit too...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, it's kind of... let me think...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You could check what happened in past years.', 4: '1'}
{3: "When the argument stalls, Wanshi, who'd been dozing off at the table, pipes up."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Last year... oh, I get it now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then that's that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Things move forward with everyone happy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{3: "You stare at the screen, but can't see or hear clearly, everything is getting distant..."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{3: 'After that, no new scenes show up, and the consciousness fades away...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory328.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'conservation area', 2: 'Morning, at the Old Dossier Building'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "I've called you a few times, but you didn't answer...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "You've been staring at your coffee. Don't like it?", 4: '1'}
{3: "You look down and see you're holding a paper cup of coffee."}
{3: "Oh yeah, you're helping the cargo crew move material from the old archives in the conservation area."}
{3: 'Just now...'}
{3: "Feels like something went down, but I can't place it..."}
{2: 'Guess I zoned out for a sec...', 3: '170'}
{2: "How's the material transfer going?", 3: '171'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: 'Just this box left—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He grips the bottom of the box and lifts it carefully.'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "Once we deliver this last batch, we're done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: 'So, got any plans for after this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why do you ask?', 3: '176'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "When we're done, we're free. Everyone's got their own plans.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: 'Some are going to check out the area, some are visiting friends in Kowloong, and some are heading straight back to Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "If you need a ride somewhere and it's on our route, we can take you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Where to next...'}
{3: 'Feels like this is a big decision...'}
{3: 'Thinking about it, you grab your coffee and take a sip—'}
{3: 'A weird sweetness hits your tongue.'}
{3: "But it's gone in a flash, like a dream. You try another sip, just normal coffee."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Member', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You barely hear someone laugh, and you barely remember something old.'}
{3: 'You chug the rest of your coffee, stand up, and throw the cup away.'}
{2: "As for where I'm going next.", 3: '192'}
{2: "I've decided."}
